text: It looks like a task for JavaScript
Yes we did but didn't get result can you suggest some code

Is there any way to add an Icon field to the theme fields.json and if so what are the required settings?  I’ve been trying to add one similar to if I was to add it to a module but I’m getting the vague “Error:One or more validation failed. Please fix the errors and try again.” so clearly either “icon” is not a field type I can use or I’m missing some required values.
